TextBlock.Text: Lotus: Huh... despite the other seals disappearing, this one is still in tact.
Solara: The others were unsealed after you messed with the tesseract. Unsealing this one probably won't be as easy as flipping back, but there must be some clues somewhere.
Kestrel: Let's retrace our steps, look at the other structures again. I'm sure we'll figure it out.
